content:
CertStoreLocation CertStoreLocation Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Azure.Batch.dll

The location of a certificate store on a pool's compute nodes.

Edit

In this Article

public enum CertStoreLocationPublic Enum CertStoreLocation

Fields

CurrentUser CurrentUser

The X.509 certificate store used by the current user.
LocalMachine LocalMachine

The X.509 certificate store assigned to the local machine.
Unmapped Unmapped

The service reported an option that is not recognized by this version of the Batch client.
